qas.question: Which countries make up the border?
What can travel freely between the 2 sides of the island?

answers.text: people and goods may travel freely between the two sides of the island

qas.question: What kind of border is between the territories on the island?

answers.text: no physical border between the French and Dutch territories on the island

paragraphs.context: There’s no physical border between the French and Dutch territories on the island and people and goods may travel freely between the two sides of the island.

qas.question: What replacement will do if i don't have a printed text available?

answers.text: a handwritten copy of the text

paragraphs.context: You are able to produce a handwritten copy of the text if you do not have access to a printed form.

qas.question: What times are beach access permitted?
What may only be accessed from 5:00 am until 6:00 pm daily?

paragraphs.context: Beaches may be accessed from 5:00 am until 6:00 pm daily.
